itunes:title: Doctrine and Covenants 3-5 : Dr. Gerrit Dirkmaat : Part I
title: Doctrine and Covenants 3-5 : Dr. Gerrit Dirkmaat : Part I
description:
Have you made a mistake that takes 2400+ years to repair? How did the stolen 116 pages affect the relationship between Joseph Smith, Lucy Mack Smith, Lucy Harris, and Martin Harris? Join us for Episode 4 as Dr. Gerrit Dirkmaat dramatically shares details about Emma’s brush with death, Joseph and Emma’s first baby’s passing, and why the pages were stolen and not lost--stolen!
Show notes available at followhim.co
content:encoded:

itunes:author: Hank Smith & John Bytheway
